description: Mao finally reveals that she is Hana. The place she has chosen for the important confession is, not the press conference that had been prepared, but her first fan event. She wants to tell the truth to the fans directly in her own words... The serious Hana in the face of anxiety, and Mao in the face of Hana`s fans, how will their courage and determination reach everyone`s hearts―?

titles.title: Sekai ni Hitotsu dake no Hana
The One and Only Hana in the World
世界に一つだけのハナ
